oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On the number of generators of the module of derivations and multiplicity of certain rings
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GURJAR, RV
WAGH, V
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: rational-singularities
surface singularities
module of derivations
ring of invariants
multiplicity
rational singularities
divisor class group
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The present paper studies the module of derivations of certain rings and the multiplicity of certain rational surface singularities. We also consider some relation between these two for 2-dimensionat quotient singularities. We conjecture a relation between the multiplicity of a rational surface singularity and the order of the divisor class group of the singularity and verify the same for several cases. (c) 2007
